page.title: 12KEMBLE FETE
page.content: One of{Kemble's}most enjoyable occasions is the{Kemble}fete at{Kemble {House.}At the fete we usually have a painting competition. The paintings are dislayed in the house and a lady comes and judges them. This year it was Daphne Neville and her otter, Bee. At the Fete there are stalls and competitions, and there are lots of games to play. There is always a raffle. On the lawn by the kitchen, you can get refeshments.{Kemble House garden is very big and beautiful. {Kemble Fete}is good for old people because they have a chance to talk to their friends. This year the fete raised Â£950 for church funds.
